nav.whatsappMessage: Hi, I would like to get more information about the training plans. Thank you!

hero.title: Come to GOAT to
hero.subtitle: No matter what your goal is, we help you achieve it. Group and personalized programs designed to take you to the next level, whatever your starting point.

services.title: Training Programs
services.description: Comprehensive programs designed to enhance sports development in all its facets. We offer specific training for each discipline, tailored to individual needs and goals of each athlete, from beginners to professionals.

personalTraining.title: Personal Training
personalTraining.description: Individual sessions tailored to your specific needs. Develop your skills with personalized attention from our expert coaches.
personalTraining.longDescription: Our personalized training program is designed to maximize your sports potential through individualized sessions. We work with a comprehensive approach that covers technical, tactical, physical, and mental aspects. Each session is specifically planned for you, considering your goals, current level, and playing position. Our coaches help you identify areas for improvement and develop a progressive plan to take you to the next level.

schedule.0: Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM - 9:00 PM (60 or 90-minute sessions)

features.0: Complete initial skills or fitness assessment
features.1: Personalized training plan based on your goals
features.3: Coaches with national and international experience

academies.title: Hockey Academy
academies.description: Join our structured program with regular training sessions, skill development workshops, and competitive play opportunities in hockey.
academies.longDescription: GOAT Sports Academy offers a comprehensive development program for hockey players of all levels. Participants train in small groups organized by age and level, allowing for comprehensive attention within a team environment.

schedule.0: Hockey - Monday to Friday 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM

features.2: Specialized coaches with national and international experience
features.3: Access to special clinics with professional players

teamTraining.title: Train with your team
teamTraining.description: Rent our first-class facilities for training with your team. Full access to fields, equipment, and everything you need to train.
teamTraining.longDescription: We offer our facilities for teams looking for a professional space for their training. Rental includes full access to our playing fields with professional synthetic surface, specialized training equipment, and high-performance gym. Optionally, we can provide specialized coaches for specific sessions or themed clinics. Our facilities are ideal for club teams, national teams, school teams, or corporate groups looking for a premium training experience.

schedule.0: Monday to Friday: 7:00 AM - 11:00 PM (subject to availability)
schedule.2: Possibility of recurring weekly or monthly bookings
schedule.3: Special hours available for concentrations or intensive sessions

features.0: Playing fields with professional synthetic surface

partnerships.headline: Want to study and play
partnerships.tagline: Turn your dream into your future.
partnerships.allianceTitle: An alliance to fulfill your American dream
partnerships.allianceDescription: GOAT Sports and US Full Ride have joined forces to open the doors of the best universities in the United States to Argentine hockey players. This strategic alliance combines GOAT's expertise in sports development with US Full Ride's expertise in university scholarships, creating a unique path for you to study, compete, and grow professionally in the USA.

scholarships.title: Scholarships up to 100%
scholarships.description: Can include tuition, accommodation, meals, books, and sports equipment

competition.title: High-level competition
competition.description: Play in NCAA college leagues while you study

support.title: Comprehensive support
support.description: We guide you from application to your arrival in the USA

network.title: Network of contacts
network.description: Connect with coaches and universities throughout the United States

staff.title: About Us
staff.description: We are partners, friends, and teammates, driven by the passion to accompany athletes on their journey towards their dreams. We set out to create a place where we can give you the tools, support, and guidance you need to achieve any goal you set.
staff.description2: At GOAT Sports, we are dedicated to developing field hockey players who excel on and off the field. With a comprehensive approach, we work on your technique, tactical vision, physical condition, and mental strength.

experts.title: Expert Coaches
experts.description: Our coaching team includes former national players and certified instructors with years of experience.

personalized.title: Personalized Development
personalized.description: We create individualized training plans based on your current abilities and future goals.

facilities.title: First-class Facilities
facilities.description: Train in premium facilities with the most advanced equipment and technology.

results.title: Proven Results
results.description: Our athletes have achieved results at collegiate, national, and international levels.

staff.teamDescription: Meet the people who will accompany you in your athletic growth. Each of our coaches brings their unique experience and passion for the sport to help you reach your full potential.

santiago.bio: Olympic player with over 10 years of presence on the Men's National Hockey Team.

gonzalo.bio: Player, coach, and trainer with extensive experience in first division clubs and local teams.

thomas.bio: Olympic player with over 100 international caps on the Men's National Hockey Team.

ignacio.bio: Player and Captain of the first division at Gimnasia y Esgrima Club.

trainingCenter.title: Training Center
trainingCenter.description: Discover our first-class facilities designed to maximize your performance and training experience.
trainingCenter.facilityDescription: Our training center located in Vicente López features two synthetic turf fields, gym, and everything needed for sports development in a professional environment.
trainingCenter.ctaDescription: We invite you to visit our training center and experience firsthand everything GOAT Sports has to offer.
trainingCenter.whatsappMessage: Hi, I would like to schedule a visit to the facilities. Thanks!

campus.title: Campus & Clinics
campus.description: Our GOAT Sports Hockey Campus are immersive experiences designed for players of all levels: from beginners to high-performance athletes. Over several days, you'll combine technical training, tactical work, specific physical preparation, and mental strengthening dynamics, while we create a fun environment and instill a passion for the sport.
campus.description2: Come perfect your game, meet new friends, and experience sports with the energy and support of GOAT Sports.

summer2026.title: Summer Campus 2026 at GEBA
summer2026.description: Start 2026 strong! Our Summer Campus at GEBA is already a classic that surpasses itself year after year. Start the season with the best preparation, the best coaches, and all the GOAT energy. Follow us on Instagram to be the first to know when we open registration.

showcaseUsa2026.title: USA Showcase - University Scholarships
showcaseUsa2026.description: GOAT Sports and US Full Ride invite you to the USA Showcase: a day of technical and tactical evaluation with specialized coaches, video recording for your athletic profile, and an informational session about the U.S. university system and scholarship process. Scholarships covering up to 100% including tuition, housing, meals, books, and sports equipment. For hockey players aged 14 to 22.

rosario2025.title: Summer Campus 2025 in Rosario
rosario2025.description: We're bringing the full GOAT experience to Rosario, and we invite you to experience this edition at the first-class facilities offered by Estancia Damfield.

summer2025.title: Summer Campus 2025 at GEBA
summer2025.description: Our Campus at GEBA has become a summer classic that improves every year, and 2025 will be no exception. Follow us on Instagram to be the first to know when we open registration.

winter2025.title: Winter Campus 2025 at GEBA
winter2025.description: Don't miss our upcoming Winter Campus! 2 to 3 days of intensive training with the best coaches. Perfect your technique, improve your physical condition, and develop your tactical vision in a professional and fun environment. Limited spots, reserve your place now!

gbaSur2025.title: GBA South Campus 2025 at MGRC
gbaSur2025.description: You asked for it and we listened - we're coming to the South Zone! Introducing the Winter Campus at Monte Grande Rugby Club. The same experience as always, but closer to you.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Professional sports consulting services for clubs, schools, and gated communities looking to elevate their sports level.

clubs.title: Club Consulting
clubs.description: Comprehensive advice to improve hockey programs, from organizational structure to training methods.

schools.title: School Programs
schools.description: Development of educational hockey programs adapted to the school environment, integrating sports values with academic objectives.

communities.title: Services for Gated Communities
communities.description: Creation and management of recreational and competitive programs for residential communities.

methods.title: Training Methods
methods.description: Implementation of innovative methodologies based on the latest trends and backed by sports science.

clinics.title: Personalized Clinics
clinics.description: Design and execution of clinics tailored to specific needs, focused on technical, tactical, or physical areas.

consulting.whatsappMessage: Hi, I would like to get information about consulting services. Thanks!

testimonials.title: What Our Athletes Say
testimonials.description: Hear from athletes who have transformed their game with GOAT Sports.

catalina.quote: Training at GOAT helped me grow tremendously in technique and maintaining daily discipline. Improving and enhancing my athletic level!
catalina.name: Catalina Alimenti
catalina.title: Las Leonas Player

angie.quote: Training at Goat not only enhanced and took my technical and physical abilities to another level, but it's also a place with incredible energy and atmosphere that pushes you to go further and where you truly learn from the best
angie.name: Angie Belosio
angie.title: Banco Nacion Player

martina.quote: I really enjoy GOAT camps! They allow me to improve my skills and learn new technical gestures. The coaches are amazing!!! They're always looking out for us and taking care of us at all times
martina.name: Martina Giannini
martina.title: GEBA Player

sofia.quote: I've been training for 3 years and I love it because the coaches help me so much. It's a space where I feel comfortable and where I really notice my growth as a player. I'm very grateful for everyone's support and dedication, I know I can always count on them!
sofia.name: Sofia Villarreal
sofia.title: GEBA Player

contact.title: Ready to take your game to the next level?
contact.description: Contact us today and start your path to sports excellence.

success.title: Message Sent!
success.description: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

form.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive training tips, event announcements, and exclusive offers.

success.title: Thank you for subscribing!
success.description: You have successfully subscribed to our newsletter.

footer.tagline: GOAT Sports, much more than a training center.

sponsors.title: Our Sponsors
sponsors.description: We thank the brands that trust us and make our work easier

metadata.title: GOAT Sports - Field Hockey and Football Training Academy
metadata.description: Sports academy specializing in field hockey and football. We offer personalized training, sports camps, and consulting services for clubs and schools in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
metadata.ogDescription: Expert field hockey and football training. Personalized coaching and immersive programs to take your skills to the next level.
